storyline.title: Israeli-Palestinian peace process
storyline.synposis: The international effort for peace to be agreed to in both the Arab-Israeli conflict and in the Palestinian-Israeli conflict.

events.title: US presses for reform in Israeli-Palestinian talks

creativeWorks.title: Obama says 1967 'basis' for Israel-Palestinian peace
creativeWorks.description: US President Barack Obama tells the BBC that the lines of the pre-1967 Mid-East conflict must be the "basis for negotiations" over the borders of Israel and a Palestinian state.
